title: Ep. 21. Petals to the Metal - Chapter Four
description: Having straight-up embarrassed themselves in their first encounter with The Raven, our heroes look for alternative methods of defeating her. Merle channels a Train God. Magnus makes a fishy deal. Taako receives some bathroom aid.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
